verses.verse: ( God Is Our Refuge and Strength) ( 120 18:13-16 ;  140 32:1-8 ) לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liḇ·nê- Of the sons קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> qō·raḥ of Korah. עַֽל־ <WH5921> ‘al- According to עֲלָמ֥וֹת <WH5961> ‘ă·lā·mō·wṯ Alamoth. ( Alamoth is probably a musical or liturgical term; here and in .) שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> šîr A song. אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God לָ֭נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) is our מַחֲסֶ֣ה 4268 N-ms ( ma·ḥă·seh) refuge וָעֹ֑ז 5797 Conj-w│N-ms ( wā·‘ōz) and strength, עֶזְרָ֥ה 5833 N-fs ( ‘ez·rāh) help בְ֝צָר֗וֹת 6869 Prep-b│N-fp ( ḇə·ṣā·rō·wṯ) in times of trouble. נִמְצָ֥א 4672 V-Nifal-Perf-3ms ( nim·ṣā) an ever-present מְאֹֽד׃ 3966 Adv ( mə·’ōḏ) ...

עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- Therefore כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> kên ... לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- we will not נִ֭ירָא <WH3372> nî·rā fear, בְּהָמִ֣יר <WH4171> bə·hā·mîr is transformed אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ though the earth וּבְמ֥וֹט <WH4131> ū·ḇə·mō·wṭ are toppled הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> hā·rîm and the mountains בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> bə·lêḇ into the depths יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> yam·mîm of the seas,

יֶהֱמ֣וּ <WH1993> ye·hĕ·mū roar יֶחְמְר֣וּ <WH2560> yeḥ·mə·rū and foam מֵימָ֑יו <WH4325> mê·māw though their waters יִֽרְעֲשֽׁוּ־ <WH7493> yir·‘ă·šū- quake הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> hā·rîm and the mountains בְּגַאֲוָת֣וֹ <WH1346> bə·ḡa·’ă·wā·ṯōw in the surge. סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

נָהָ֗ר <WH5104> nā·hār There is a river פְּלָגָ֗יו <WH6388> pə·lā·ḡāw whose streams יְשַׂמְּח֥וּ <WH8055> yə·śam·mə·ḥū delight עִיר־ <WH5892> ‘îr- the city אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm of God, קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <WH6918> qə·ḏōš the holy [place where] מִשְׁכְּנֵ֥י <WH4908> miš·kə·nê dwells. עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> ‘el·yō·wn the Most High

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God בְּ֭קִרְבָּהּ <WH7130> bə·qir·bāh is within her; בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- she will not תִּמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> tim·mō·wṭ be moved. יַעְזְרֶ֥הָ <WH5826> ya‘·zə·re·hā will help her אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God לִפְנ֥וֹת <WH6437> lip̄·nō·wṯ dawns. בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> bō·qer when morning

הָמ֣וּ <WH1993> hā·mū rage, ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> ḡō·w·yim Nations מָ֣טוּ <WH4131> mā·ṭū crumble; מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <WH4467> mam·lā·ḵō·wṯ kingdoms נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> nā·ṯan when He lifts בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ <WH6963> bə·qō·w·lōw His voice. תָּמ֥וּג <WH4127> tā·mūḡ melts אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> ṣə·ḇā·’ō·wṯ of Hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> ‘im·mā·nū is with us; מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <WH4869> miś·gāḇ- is our fortress לָ֝נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) . אֱלֹהֵ֖י 430 N-mpc ( ’ĕ·lō·hê) the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב 3290 N-proper-ms ( ya·‘ă·qōḇ) of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ 5542 Interjection ( se·lāh) Selah

לְֽכוּ־ <WH1980> lə·ḵū- Come, חֲ֭זוּ <WH2372> ḥă·zū see מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <WH4659> mip̄·‘ă·lō·wṯ the works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- who שָׂ֖ם <WH7760> śām brings שַׁמּ֣וֹת <WH8047> šam·mō·wṯ devastation בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> bā·’ā·reṣ upon the earth.

מַשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> maš·bîṯ to cease מִלְחָמוֹת֮ <WH4421> mil·ḥā·mō·wṯ He makes wars עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- throughout קְצֵ֪ה <WH7097> qə·ṣêh ... הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the earth; קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> qe·šeṯ the bow יְ֭שַׁבֵּר <WH7665> yə·šab·bêr He breaks וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <WH7112> wə·qiṣ·ṣêṣ and shatters חֲנִ֑ית <WH2595> ḥă·nîṯ the spear; עֲ֝גָל֗וֹת <WH5699> ‘ă·ḡā·lō·wṯ the shields ( Or chariots) יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> yiś·rōp̄ He burns בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> bā·’êš in the fire.

הַרְפּ֣וּ <WH7503> har·pū “ Be still וּ֭דְעוּ <WH3045> ū·ḏə·‘ū and know כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- that אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> ’ā·nō·ḵî I אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm am God; אָר֥וּם <WH7311> ’ā·rūm I will be exalted בַּ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> bag·gō·w·yim among the nations, אָר֥וּם <WH7311> ’ā·rūm I will be exalted בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> bā·’ā·reṣ over the earth. ”

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> ṣə·ḇā·’ō·wṯ of Hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> ‘im·mā·nū is with us; מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <WH4869> miś·gāḇ- is our fortress לָ֝נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) . אֱלֹהֵ֖י 430 N-mpc ( ’ĕ·lō·hê) the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב 3290 N-proper-ms ( ya·‘ă·qōḇ) of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ 5542 Interjection ( se·lāh) Selah
